lesson.title: What Modern B2B Sales Means in 2026

questions.question: What is the primary goal of modern B2B sales in this course?
options: Make as many calls and pitches as possible
Support decisions and reduce risk with a clear next step
Fill the CRM as admin work

questions.question: What separates a system from a tactic?
options: A system is one good line; a tactic is a pipeline
A system is definitions, steps, and measurement; a tactic is a short trick

questions.question: Why is “more activity = more results” risky?
options: Because without ICP and qualification, more activity just creates noise
Because activity lowers win rate by default

questions.question: Why isn’t pitching enough?
options: Buyers want risk reduction and a clear next step, not product monologues
